entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, who has a special protection due to his mother's sacrifice.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the antagonist of the story, who shed Harry's mother's blood.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise and powerful wizard, who placed a charm on Harry to protect him.

entities.name: harry's mother
entities.description: Harry's mother died to save her son, giving him a special protection that flows in his veins.

relationships.description: Dumbledore placed a charm on Harry to protect him.
Harry's mother gave her son a special protection that flows in his veins.
Voldemort cannot harm Harry as long as he is in the place where his mother's blood dwells.
